se.lu.nateko.edca

Class BackboneSvc

  • java.lang.Object
    • Service
      • se.lu.nateko.edca.BackboneSvc

  • public class BackboneSvc
extends Service

See the GNU General Public License * for more details. * * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along * with EDCA. If not, see "http://www.gnu.org/licenses/". * * The latest source for this software can be accessed at * "github.org/mattiassp/edca". * * EDCA also utilizes the JTS Topology Suite, Version 1.8 by Vivid * Solutions Inc. It is released under the Lesser General Public License * ("http://www.gnu.org/licenses/") and its source can be accessed at the * JTS Topology Suite website ("http://www.vividsolutions.com/jts"). * * Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. The Android source is released * under the Apache License 2.0 * ("http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0") and can be accessed at * "http://source.android.com/". * * For other enquiries, e-mail to: edca.contact@gmail.com * * General purpose Service, keeps track of the currently active * ServerConnection, the active GeographyLayer, the HTTP connection and * most of the other application-wide information. * *

    0.91, 2013-07-24 * *

    Mattias Spångmyr *

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BackboneSvc.SvcAccessor
      A local implementation of Binder that simply lets the calling Activity fetch the Service reference.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ACTIVITY_ATTRIBUTEEDITOR
      Constant identifying the AttributeEditor Activity.
      static int ACTIVITY_DEFAULT
      Constant identifying a non-specific Activity.
      static int ACTIVITY_LAYERVIEWER
      Constant identifying the LayerViewer Activity.
      static int ACTIVITY_MAPVIEWER
      Constant identifying the MapViewer Activity.
      static int ACTIVITY_SERVEREDITOR
      Constant identifying the ServerEditor Activity.
      static int ACTIVITY_SERVERVIEWER
      Constant identifying the ServerViewer Activity.
      static int CONNECTED
      Constant identifying that the Service is in a connected state, with an active ServerConnection that has been reached.
      static int CONNECTING
      Constant identifying that the Service is in a connecting state, currently using an active ServerConnection to try to reach a server.
      static int DISCONNECTED
      Constant identifying that the Service is in a disconnected state, lacking an active ServerConnection.
      private Activity mActiveActivity
      The current foreground Activity.
      private GetCapabilities mActiveCapabilities
      The GetCapabilities object most recently created, to call the active server to request a list of layers and capabilities and to parse and report the response.
      private GetMap mActiveGetMap
      The GetMap object most recently created, to call the active server to request a map image and pass on the response.
      private GeographyLayer mActiveLayer
      The active GeographyLayer, holding information about the layer being targeted for data collection as well as holding any collected data waiting for upload.
      private ServerConnection mActiveServer
      The ServerConnection currently connected, or connecting, to.
      private boolean mAlteringAnimation
      Whether or not a thread is currently altering the RotateAnimation.
      private IBinder mBinder
      Binder given to client Activities in order to access this Service.
      boolean mCombining
      Flag showing whether or not the user is currently allowed to select points for combining into sequences (lines or polygons).
      private java.lang.Long mConnectingRow
      Stores the row number in the local SQLite database which holds the server information currently being used, or most recently used, to connect to a server.
      private RotateAnimation mConnectionAnimation
      An application-wide RotateAnimation that ensures that the symbol indicating communication with the geospatial server is animated similarly in each Activity.
      private int mConnectState
      Flag keeping track of the Service's state of connectedness to a server.
      private DescribeFeatureType mDescribeFeatureType
      The DescribeFeatureType task most recently created, which requests information about a layer on the geospatial server and reports it to create a new GeographyLayer.
      private GeoHelper mGeoHelper
      The GeoHelper most recently created, which handles saving to and loading from the external storage (e.g.
      private com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.GeometryFactory mGeomFac
      A JTS 1.8 GeometryFactory that is kept for the lifetime of the application.
      private HttpClient mHttpClient
      Application-wide HttpClient stored for re-use.
      private boolean mHttpConnecting
      Whether or not a thread is currently using the HttpClient to communicate with a server.
      private boolean mInitialRenewLayer
      Checked in renewActiveLayer(boolean) and changed to false after running the method to ensure that it is only run once.
      static boolean mInitialRenewSrvConnection
      Flag passed to renewLastServerConnection(boolean) to allow it to run.
      private LocalSQLDBhelper mSQLhelper
      The helper class used to access and edit the local SQLite database.
      java.lang.String[] mTempText
      If the user leaves the ServerEditor activity, any entered text is held here temporarily until the service is destroyed or a ServerConnection is saved.
      private boolean mUploading
      Whether or not an upload is currently underway.
      static java.lang.String PACKAGE_NAME
      String initialized in onCreate(), storing the application's package name for easy access.
      static int ROTATION_DURATION
      Constant defining the time it should take (in milliseconds) the RotateAnimation to complete one spin.
      static java.lang.String TAG
      The error tag for this Service.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearConnection(boolean reportFailure)
      Should be called whenever server communication fails, requiring the user to reconnect.
      void clearRemoteLayers()
      Remove all layers that are not active or stored from the layer table, e.g.
      void deactivateLayers()
      Deactivates all layers by removing the "active" factor from the layer mode.
      GeographyLayer generateGeographyLayer(java.lang.String layerName)
      Generates a GeographyLayer object with attributes, ready for adding geometry.
      Activity getActiveActivity()
      Method that gets the reference to the currently active Activity to which results and alerts are posted.
      GetCapabilities getActiveCapabilities()
      Get method for retrieving the stored GetCapabilities object relating to the active ServerConnection from the BackboneSvc.
      GetMap getActiveGetMap()
      Get method for retrieving the GetMap object last created by the MapViewer from the BackboneSvc.
      GeographyLayer getActiveLayer()
      Get method for the currently active local layer.
      ServerConnection getActiveServer()
      Get method for retrieving the currently active ServerConnection object from the BackboneSvc.
      private boolean getAlteringAnimation()
      Fetches the flag showing whether or not the RotateAnimation is being altered.
      RotateAnimation getAnimation()
      Fetches the application-wide rotation animation instance.
      RotateAnimation getAnimationNoQueue()
      Gets the RotateAnimation in a non-thread safe way, and should thus not be used to alter the animation in any way.
      java.lang.Long getConnectingRow()
      Get method for the row (in the database table) that is currently being connected to.
      int getConnectState()
      Gets the connect state of the BackboneSvc.
      com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.GeometryFactory getGeometryFactory()
      Gets the GeometryFactory which handles creation of geometries from coordinates using a specified precision model.
      HttpClient getHttpClient()
      Fetches the application-wide HttpClient instance.
      LocalSQLDBhelper getSQLhelper()
      Get method for retrieving the local SQLite database helper from the BackboneSvc.
      boolean getUploading()
      Gets the flag indicating whether or not an upload process is underway.
      private boolean isHttpConnecting()
      Fetches the flag showing whether or not an HTTP connection is ongoing.
      void makeDescribeFeatureTypeRequest(ServerConnection srv, java.lang.String layerName, long rowId)
      Method that initiates a DescribeFeatureType request on a separate thread.
      void makeGetCapabilitiesRequest(ServerConnection srv)
      Method that initiates a GetCapabilities request on a separate thread.
      void makeGetMapRequest(ServerConnection srv, View layout, com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds bounds)
      Method that initiates a GetMap request on a separate thread.
      void makeLoadOperation(long rowId)
      Starts the process of loading a locally stored layer into the active layer on a separate thread.
      void makeSaveOperation(int rwMode)
      Starts the process of storing the active layer's data on a separate thread, on the geospatial server or locally.

      void onCreate() 
      void onDestroy() 
      int onStartCommand(Intent intent, int flags, int startId) 
      void renewActiveLayer()
      Try to load a Layer from the stored information in the local SQLite database and on the external storage of the device.

      Method that tries to make a GetCapabilities request to the most recently used server connection if there is one.

      Set method to assign a ServerConnection object to be the currently active connection, and tries to connect with a getCapabilities request.

      Sets which row (in the server table) that is currently being connected to.

      Sets the value of the connect state flag.

      Sets the flag indicating whether or not an upload process is underway.
      void showAlertDialog(java.lang.String message, Activity target)
      Method that displays an alert dialog to the user showing the string argument as the message text.
      void showToast(java.lang.String message, int duration)
      Method that displays an on screen text (Toast) to the user showing the string argument as the message text.
      void startAnimation()
      Start the Service's RotateAnimation.
      void stopAnimation()
      Stop the Service's RotateAnimation.
      void unlockAnimation()
      Indicates that alteration of the animation is finished, allowing the first thread waiting to access the animation to proceed.
      void unlockHttpClient()
      Sets whether or not an HTTP connection is ongoing, to prevent multiple uses of the HttpClient concurrently.
      void updateLayoutOnState()
      A method that checks which Activity is currently active and updates its layout according to the current state of the server connection, the active layer, and the map.

      • PACKAGE_NAME

        public static java.lang.String PACKAGE_NAME
        String initialized in onCreate(), storing the application's package name for easy access. This is used to e.g. determine the folder path to the applications locally stored data.

        Constant Field Values

      • mConnectState

        private int mConnectState
        Flag keeping track of the Service's state of connectedness to a server. DISCONNECTED by default.

      • mConnectingRow

        private java.lang.Long mConnectingRow
        Stores the row number in the local SQLite database which holds the server information currently being used, or most recently used, to connect to a server.

      • mUploading

        private boolean mUploading
        Whether or not an upload is currently underway.

      • mCombining

        public boolean mCombining
        Flag showing whether or not the user is currently allowed to select points for combining into sequences (lines or polygons).

      • mInitialRenewSrvConnection

        public static boolean mInitialRenewSrvConnection
        Flag passed to renewLastServerConnection(boolean) to allow it to run. Will be changed to false after running once to ensure that the method is not run repeatedly without the user's request.

      • mInitialRenewLayer

        private boolean mInitialRenewLayer
        Checked in renewActiveLayer(boolean) and changed to false after running the method to ensure that it is only run once.

      • mActiveServer

        private ServerConnection mActiveServer
        The ServerConnection currently connected, or connecting, to.

      • mActiveCapabilities

        private GetCapabilities mActiveCapabilities
        The GetCapabilities object most recently created, to call the active server to request a list of layers and capabilities and to parse and report the response.

      • mActiveGetMap

        private GetMap mActiveGetMap
        The GetMap object most recently created, to call the active server to request a map image and pass on the response.

      • mDescribeFeatureType

        private DescribeFeatureType mDescribeFeatureType
        The DescribeFeatureType task most recently created, which requests information about a layer on the geospatial server and reports it to create a new GeographyLayer.

      • mGeoHelper

        private GeoHelper mGeoHelper
        The GeoHelper most recently created, which handles saving to and loading from the external storage (e.g. sd-card) and uploading of data to the geospatial server.

      • mActiveLayer

        private GeographyLayer mActiveLayer
        The active GeographyLayer, holding information about the layer being targeted for data collection as well as holding any collected data waiting for upload.

      • mActiveActivity

        private Activity mActiveActivity
        The current foreground Activity. Set in the onBound() method of each Activity.

      • mSQLhelper

        private LocalSQLDBhelper mSQLhelper
        The helper class used to access and edit the local SQLite database.

      • mGeomFac

        private com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.GeometryFactory mGeomFac
        A JTS 1.8 GeometryFactory that is kept for the lifetime of the application. It is used to create JTS 1.8 Geometry objects that wrap around coordinates.

      • mConnectionAnimation

        private RotateAnimation mConnectionAnimation
        An application-wide RotateAnimation that ensures that the symbol indicating communication with the geospatial server is animated similarly in each Activity.

      • mAlteringAnimation

        private boolean mAlteringAnimation
        Whether or not a thread is currently altering the RotateAnimation.

      • ROTATION_DURATION

        public static final int ROTATION_DURATION
        Constant defining the time it should take (in milliseconds) the RotateAnimation to complete one spin.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • mHttpClient

        private HttpClient mHttpClient
        Application-wide HttpClient stored for re-use.

      • mHttpConnecting

        private boolean mHttpConnecting
        Whether or not a thread is currently using the HttpClient to communicate with a server.

      • mBinder

        private final IBinder mBinder
        Binder given to client Activities in order to access this Service.

      • mTempText

        public java.lang.String[] mTempText
        If the user leaves the ServerEditor activity, any entered text is held here temporarily until the service is destroyed or a ServerConnection is saved.

      • setActiveServer

        public void setActiveServer(ServerConnection srv)
        Set method to assign a ServerConnection object to be the currently active connection, and tries to connect with a getCapabilities request.
        Parameters:
        srv - The ServerConnection to be in use.

      • getActiveServer

        public ServerConnection getActiveServer()
        Get method for retrieving the currently active ServerConnection object from the BackboneSvc.
        Returns:
        The active ServerConnection object.

        Parameters:
        getCap - The active GetCapabilities object to set for this BackboneSvc.

      • getActiveCapabilities

        public GetCapabilities getActiveCapabilities()
        Get method for retrieving the stored GetCapabilities object relating to the active ServerConnection from the BackboneSvc.
        Returns:
        The GetCapabilities object of the active ServerConnection.

      • setActiveGetMap

        public void setActiveGetMap(GetMap getMap)
        Stores the GetMap object last created by the MapViewer.
        Parameters:
        getMap - The active GetMap object to set for this BackboneSvc.

      • getActiveGetMap

        public GetMap getActiveGetMap()
        Get method for retrieving the GetMap object last created by the MapViewer from the BackboneSvc.
        Returns:
        The stored GetMap object.

      • setActiveActivity

        public void setActiveActivity(Activity activeActivity)
        Method that sets the reference to the currently active Activity to which results and alerts are posted.
        Parameters:
        activeActivity - The Activity which is currently visible.

      • getActiveActivity

        public Activity getActiveActivity()
        Method that gets the reference to the currently active Activity to which results and alerts are posted.
        Returns:
        The Activity which is currently visible.

      • setActiveLayer

        public void setActiveLayer(GeographyLayer layer)
        Set method for the currently active local layer.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer to activate.

      • getActiveLayer

        public GeographyLayer getActiveLayer()
        Get method for the currently active local layer.
        Returns:
        The currently active local layer.

      • getHttpClient

        public HttpClient getHttpClient()
                         throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Fetches the application-wide HttpClient instance. Can not be fetched again until unlockHttpClient() is called. Threads calling this method before unlockHttpClient() has been called will wait indefinitely in a spin-loop.
        Returns:
        The HttpClient
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • unlockHttpClient

        public void unlockHttpClient()
        Sets whether or not an HTTP connection is ongoing, to prevent multiple uses of the HttpClient concurrently.

      • isHttpConnecting

        private boolean isHttpConnecting()
        Fetches the flag showing whether or not an HTTP connection is ongoing.
        Returns:
        True if an HTTP connection is ongoing.

      • clearConnection

        public void clearConnection(boolean reportFailure)
        Should be called whenever server communication fails, requiring the user to reconnect. Clears the active ServerConnection and sets the state to disconnected. Also clears remote layers that can no longer be accessed.
        Parameters:
        reportFailure - True to show a dialog alerting the user of a failed connection attempt.

      • setConnectState

        public void setConnectState(int state)
        Sets the value of the connect state flag. Can be DISCONNECTED (0), CONNECTED (1) or CONNECTING (2).
        Parameters:
        state - The state to set.

      • getConnectState

        public int getConnectState()
        Gets the connect state of the BackboneSvc. Can be DISCONNECTED (0), CONNECTED (1) or CONNECTING (2).
        Returns:
        The connect state.

      • setConnectingRow

        public void setConnectingRow(java.lang.Long connectingRow)
        Sets which row (in the server table) that is currently being connected to.
        Parameters:
        connectingRow - The row being connected to.

      • getConnectingRow

        public java.lang.Long getConnectingRow()
        Get method for the row (in the database table) that is currently being connected to.
        Returns:
        The row being connected to.

      • startAnimation

        public void startAnimation()
        Start the Service's RotateAnimation.

      • stopAnimation

        public void stopAnimation()
        Stop the Service's RotateAnimation.

      • getAnimation

        public RotateAnimation getAnimation()
                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Fetches the application-wide rotation animation instance. Can not be fetched using this method again until unlockAnimation() is called. Threads calling this method before unlockAnimation() has been called will wait indefinitely in a spin-loop.
        Returns:
        The stored animation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getAnimationNoQueue

        public RotateAnimation getAnimationNoQueue()
        Gets the RotateAnimation in a non-thread safe way, and should thus not be used to alter the animation in any way.
        Returns:
        The application-wide RotateAnimation.

      • unlockAnimation

        public void unlockAnimation()
        Indicates that alteration of the animation is finished, allowing the first thread waiting to access the animation to proceed.

      • getAlteringAnimation

        private boolean getAlteringAnimation()
        Fetches the flag showing whether or not the RotateAnimation is being altered.
        Returns:
        True if a thread is altering the animation.

      • setUploading

        public void setUploading(boolean uploading)
        Sets the flag indicating whether or not an upload process is underway.
        Parameters:
        uploading - True if uploading.

      • getUploading

        public boolean getUploading()
        Gets the flag indicating whether or not an upload process is underway.
        Returns:
        True if uploading.

      • getSQLhelper

        public LocalSQLDBhelper getSQLhelper()
        Get method for retrieving the local SQLite database helper from the BackboneSvc.
        Returns:
        The active ServerConnection object.

      • getGeometryFactory

        public com.vividsolutions.jts.geom.GeometryFactory getGeometryFactory()
        Gets the GeometryFactory which handles creation of geometries from coordinates using a specified precision model.
        Returns:
        The GeometryFactory.

      • deactivateLayers

        public void deactivateLayers()
        Deactivates all layers by removing the "active" factor from the layer mode.

      • clearRemoteLayers

        public void clearRemoteLayers()
        Remove all layers that are not active or stored from the layer table, e.g. because they can no longer be accessed.

      • updateLayoutOnState

        public void updateLayoutOnState()
        A method that checks which Activity is currently active and updates its layout according to the current state of the server connection, the active layer, and the map.

      • renewLastSrvConnection

        public void renewLastSrvConnection(boolean allow)
        Method that tries to make a GetCapabilities request to the most recently used server connection if there is one.
        Parameters:
        allow - Whether or not to allow the renew. Used with a flag to prevent multiple calls on application start-up.

      • renewActiveLayer

        public void renewActiveLayer()
        Try to load a Layer from the stored information in the local SQLite database and on the external storage of the device.

      • makeGetCapabilitiesRequest

        public void makeGetCapabilitiesRequest(ServerConnection srv)
        Method that initiates a GetCapabilities request on a separate thread.
        Parameters:
        srv - The ServerConnection to use for the request.

      • makeGetMapRequest

        public void makeGetMapRequest(ServerConnection srv,
                     View layout,
                     com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLngBounds bounds)
        Method that initiates a GetMap request on a separate thread.
        Parameters:
        srv - The ServerConnection to use for the request.
        layout - A layout with the same dimensions as the view to fill with the image returned by the GetMap request.
        bounds - The LatLngBounds bounding box to use for the request, specifying what area the map should cover.

      • makeDescribeFeatureTypeRequest

        public void makeDescribeFeatureTypeRequest(ServerConnection srv,
                                  java.lang.String layerName,
                                  long rowId)
        Method that initiates a DescribeFeatureType request on a separate thread.
        Parameters:
        srv - The ServerConnection to use for the request.
        layerName - The layer whose attribute information to request.
        rowId - The row ID of the layer in the local SQLite database.

      • makeSaveOperation

        public void makeSaveOperation(int rwMode)
        Starts the process of storing the active layer's data on a separate thread, on the geospatial server or locally.
        Parameters:
        rwMode - Operation mode. "Upload", "Write" or "Overwrite".

      • makeLoadOperation

        public void makeLoadOperation(long rowId)
        Starts the process of loading a locally stored layer into the active layer on a separate thread.
        Parameters:
        rowId - The rowId in the Layer table of the layer to activate.

      • generateGeographyLayer

        public GeographyLayer generateGeographyLayer(java.lang.String layerName)
        Generates a GeographyLayer object with attributes, ready for adding geometry.
        Parameters:
        layerName - The name of the layer to generate.
        Returns:
        A geometry-less GeographyLayer with its attributes loaded.

      • showAlertDialog

        public void showAlertDialog(java.lang.String message,
                   Activity target)
        Method that displays an alert dialog to the user showing the string argument as the message text.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to display in the alert dialog.
        target - The activity to display the AlertDialog in, pass null to default to the "active" Activity.

      • showToast

        public void showToast(java.lang.String message,
             int duration)
        Method that displays an on screen text (Toast) to the user showing the string argument as the message text.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to display in the Toast.
        duration - The duration of the message.
